ch.codebulb.crudlet.config

Class Options

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.codebulb.crudlet.config.Options

  • public class Options
extends Object
    Contains all the global hooks to modify the framework's default behavior.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean ALLOW_COUNT
      Global hook to disable the GET COUNT service endpoint.
      static boolean ALLOW_DELETE_ALL
      Global hook to disable the DELETE / (delete all) service endpoint.
      static boolean ALLOW_FILTERS
      Global hook to disable the GET query filter.
      static boolean CORS
      Global hook to disable the CORS filter.
      static boolean RETURN_EXCEPTION_BODY
      Global hook to disable user-friendly exception output.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Options() 

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • CORS

        public static boolean CORS
        Global hook to disable the CORS filter. false means disabled; defaults to true.

      • RETURN_EXCEPTION_BODY

        public static boolean RETURN_EXCEPTION_BODY
        Global hook to disable user-friendly exception output. If true, details of common runtime exceptions such as SQLIntegrityConstraintViolationExceptions will be returned as the body of a REST error response, which may be a security thread in a production environment; defaults to true.

      • ALLOW_DELETE_ALL

        public static boolean ALLOW_DELETE_ALL
        Global hook to disable the DELETE / (delete all) service endpoint. false means disabled; defaults to true.

      • ALLOW_FILTERS

        public static boolean ALLOW_FILTERS
        Global hook to disable the GET query filter. false means disabled; defaults to true.

      • ALLOW_COUNT

        public static boolean ALLOW_COUNT
        Global hook to disable the GET COUNT service endpoint. false means disabled; defaults to true.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Options

        public Options()
